original_text: And the men of the city went out, and fought with Joab: and there fell some of the people of the servants of David; and Uriah the Hittite died also.
korean_text: 그 성 사람들이 나와서 요압과 더불어 싸울 때에 다윗의 부하 중 몇 사람이 엎드러지고 헷 사람 우리아도 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: And the men of the city went out
and there fell some of the people of the servants of David;
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗의 신하 중 몇 사람이 죽었고

sentences.original_text: and Uriah the Hittite died also.
